level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1181.1.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-259, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.
For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Under D.C. Law 6-85, the "D.C. Procurement Practices Act of 1985", see Mayor's Order 2002-117, July 19, 2002 (49 DCR 6880).
Delegation of Authority Under D.C. Law 6-85, the "D.C. Procurement Practices Act of 1985", see Mayor's Order 2002-207, December 27, 2002 (49 DCR 11867).
